Entries.Introduction: All settled in?$1#$b#When you geta chance you should go into town and meet the girls.$0#$b#If you think I'm buff, they're going to surprise you! *chuckle*$1#$b#Not that I'm chopped liver of course! *flex*$4
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy.#$b#I didn't tell them it was you who paid for everything.
Entries.MovieInvitation: Ooh... Two tickets for tonight's show, huh? Sounds good! I'll meet you there.$h
Entries.cc_Bridge: Hey! I heard some weird noises last night, and woke up this morning to find the quarry bridge completely repaired!#$b#It's a miracle of woodworking!
Entries.cc_Complete: I'm really glad you fixed up the community center!$1#$b#If you hadn't, it would have fallen to me.
Entries.cc_Begin: Hey! I heard that Lewis showed you around the Community Center... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!
Entries.Mon: Have I told you that I built our house from the ground up?#$e#It's definitely been the highlight of my career so far.#$b#And I was skinny as a twig when I did it too.#$b#Didn't start pumping iron till after I married Demetrius and moved here to the valley.
Entries.Tue: One of these days I'm going to build this town a proper community gym.#$b#I think the girls would like that.
Entries.Wed: Hey there, @.#$b#I'm aching to put these muscles to use on a new project!$1#$b#So be sure to stop by as soon as you're ready for an upgrade!$4
Entries.Thu: I used to workout outdoors, but then Linus showed up, and it just isn't the same.$2#$b#Lucky me then that my husband is an inventor!$1#$b#He whipped me up some gym equipment, and I still use it.
Entries.Fri: You've met my son Sebastian, right? He lives downstairs.#$e#He's a little shy.#$b#...And skinny as a rail.$2#$b# but I'm sure he'll warm up to you if you're nice to him.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my Sebby... he was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in him.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in Sebastian's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about Sebastian... he doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about his future very much...#$e#I would talk to him about it but he never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: Sebastian told me he's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of him.
Entries.Sat: Sometimes I wonder if I went all out, if I could catch up to that Haley girl in town.#$b#...But I don't think a mother should be doing steroids around her children.$2#$b#Plus with how that girl has ballooned up, I doub't I'd ever match her in size.$5
Entries.Sun: I tell you, if you want to build your upper body up, nothing beats chopping wood!$5#$b#I suppose mining some stone with your pickaxe would work too.#$b#Then you can bring all those materials to me for upgrades!#$b#$1
Entries.Sun2: #$1 RobinDem#My husband almost set the house on fire last night with his science experiment. One of his beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters! Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.$u#$e#Sorry if it smells weird in here, @. It's my husband's bizarre science project...
Entries.Sun6: Hi @! It's good to see you.#$e#You're a regular member of the community now, don't you think?
Entries.event_wood1: Great, then this blueprint should be a piece of cake for you!$h
Entries.event_wood2: Well, then I have the perfect blueprint to get you started!
Entries.summer_Mon: Wood is a wonderful substance... it's versatile, cheap, strong, and each piece has it's own unique character!
Entries.summer_Tue: I think this sunscreen Demetrius created is bad...$5#$b#My muscles feel tingly...$2
Entries.summer_Fri: Sebby always get so fussy when I bust out my old bikini.#$b#I guess it is odd to have a mom who's more muscualr than her son, though. So I understand.#$b#At least anywhere but here anyway.#$b#Still, doen't mean I'm not going to enjoy the summer!$1
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#Maru likes gems. She uses them in her inventions.#$e#So how are you and Maru getting along?
Entries.fall_Thu: Those girls really don't dress very modestly, do they$2?#$b#Though I guess I wasn't as muscular as they are when I was a girl.#$b#Kind of a shame, looking back on it.
Entries.fall_Fri: Have you met the wild man that lives behind our house?$s#$e#I guess I don't really mind, as long as he doesn't bother us.
Entries.winter_Mon: Hey, it's a perfect time of year to gather wood.#$e#Maybe you can collect enough to upgrade your house!
Entries.winter_Fri: My parents were bewildered when I told them I wanted to be a carpenter.#$e#They were pretty old-fashioned.
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I hope you'll convince Sebby to put on some muscle.#$b#Put him to work in the feild I say!$1
Entries.winter_Sat: I love the winter time.#$b#But no matter how much muscle I put on, the cold seeps right down to the bone.2#$b#Does that mean I'm getting old?$5
